comments:
using the gmfgen file to generate the diagram plugin ,it's ok. 
Then if just delete the src directory,and generate again,
will get the exception:
org.eclipse.gmf.common.UnexpectedBehaviourException: no source root can be found
at org.eclipse.gmf.internal.common.codegen.GeneratorBase.initializeEditorProject(GeneratorBase.java:178)
at org.eclipse.gmf.internal.common.codegen.GeneratorBase.initializeEditorProject(GeneratorBase.java:152)
at org.eclipse.gmf.codegen.util.Generator.customRun(Generator.java:93)
at org.eclipse.gmf.internal.common.codegen.GeneratorBase.doRun(GeneratorBase.java:408)
at org.eclipse.gmf.internal.common.codegen.GeneratorBase.run(GeneratorBase.java:69)
at org.eclipse.gmf.internal.codegen.popup.actions.ExecuteTemplatesAction.run(ExecuteTemplatesAction.java:120)
at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run(ModalContext.java:113)

Check the diagram Plugin, the new src directory is created ,but not add into the build path.I add the directory into build path by hand,the generation
will run smoothly.
We delegate to EMF utility class to create the project. However, EMF doesn't use JavaModel during generation, hence, they don't care about missed root.

traces.message: no source root can be found
